content.p: As a graduate of the University of Nottingham you'll be invited to attend a whole host of exciting alumni events. The alumni programme spans a wide range of areas including professional development and careers related events â€“ all of which can open up networks and provide valuable guidance and opportunities. Within our alumni network, there are a number of individual groups and societies, who organise regular events across the globe. So wherever your travels take you, you'll never be far from a friendly face from Nottingham. Our award-winning Careers and Employability Service offers ongoing support for planning and developing your career after you graduate. How to apply Fees and funding
